frontend/src/hooks/useLocInvoiceReceivab: Empty file with no implemented logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for invoices, inquiries, and LOC inquiries using the backend actor.

frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero, navigation links to intake and billing, service descriptions, and feature cards.
frontend/src/pages/HospiceBilling.tsx: Simple page displaying a header and description for hospice billing management.
